Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1970...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/16/1972, off Dwight Siebler (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/27/1972, off Ron Klimkowski (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York (N) on 5/5/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/6/1973, hitting .556 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/8/1973...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Los Angeles on 8/3/1976...
Injured on 5/23/1977 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1977, hitting .407 with 5 HR, 18 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 8/12/1977...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1977, hitting .339 with 8 HR, 33 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1978, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Injured on 9/23/1978 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1979, hitting .464 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against St. Louis on 8/12/1979...
